scripts.test: node --inspect-brk=9229 node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/steps-definitions -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.debug: node --inspect node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/steps-definitions -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
